description: Huit confronts Mirim, and try to convince her to leave Ymir and queen`s army. Mirim declines, as she finally feels that someone needs her. Annelotte and Huit decide to force Mirim out of queen supporters by destroying her Vibration Armor. Annelotte finally confronts Mirim and her nearly invincible Hyper Vibration Armor. Ymir shows her true colors, leaving Mirim, and trying to steal Vante. In the middle of the fierce showdown, Captain Liliana`s flying pirate ship suddenly appears in the sky above, and captures Vante along with her remote control device.

titles.title: A Crown of Flowers and the Hidden Power
花飾りと秘められた力
